Race.SpecificTitle: PW Courthouse and Jail Complex -- 2.34 Mills Renewal - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
(Courthouse and Jail Complex)
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Lafayette, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a 2.34 mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $5,286,267 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purposes of maintaining, operating and improving the Lafayette Parish Courthouse Complex?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Min. Security Detention and Corr. Facility -- 2.06 Mills Renewal - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
(Minimum Security Detention and Correctional Facility)
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Lafayette, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a 2.06 mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $4,653,718 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purposes of maintaining, operating and improving the minimum security detention and correctional facility?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Public Health -- 3.56 Mills Rededication - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Lafayette, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to rededicate the proceeds heretofore or hereafter received by the Parish from the levy and collection of a 3.56 mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish, authorized pursuant to Proposition No. 2 at an election held on March 28, 2015 (the "Tax") (an estimated $8,000,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), to be levied through the year 2025, for the following purposes: (i) 1.10 mills together with $9,000,000 heretofore collected, for the purpose of constructing, acquiring, improving and maintaining drains and drainage facilities in the Parish, (ii) .25 mills for the purpose of providing, establishing, operating, improving, and expanding public facilities and programs to foster and enhance the Parish's culture, recreation, entertainment, arts, tourism and their respective economies, and (iii) 2.21 mills for public health purposes as set forth in Proposition No. 2 of the election held on March 28, 2015?
